name: Choose leave for half day option from Leave tab

testSteps.description: 1: Choose leave for half day option from Leave tab ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=Apply, defaultTab=Leave, fromDate=21/10/2022, toDate=21/10/2022, halfDayOptions=First half leave,Second half leave, heading=Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "Apply" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
And Verify "Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request" of "Apply" tab
Then Select "21/10/2022" From date and "21/10/2022" till Leave dates from Calendar
When Click on "Leave for half day" checkbox
And Verify "First half leave,Second half leave" half day options are available

userStory.narrative: This tests are for Apply module of MIS Beta

title: Choose leave for half day option from Leave tab

values: Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "<childTab>" sub tab of "<parentTab>" tab
And Verify "<heading>" of "<childTab>" tab
And Verify "<defaultTab>" displays by default
Then Select "<fromDate>" From date and "<toDate>" till Leave dates from Calendar
When Click on "Leave for half day" checkbox
And Verify "<halfDayOptions>" half day options are available
